frontmatter.title: Do Not Come Here For Justice
frontmatter.description: They say staying is a choice. But staying in a toxic relationship isn't the real choice we make. It’s the pursuit of justice. We believe fairness can be achieved if we just try hard enough, but that belief often keeps us trapped. When justice fails as a survival strategy, what’s left? Letting go can be the hardest but most necessary lesson.
